scripts.new: new() { touch "inputs/${1:-00}.txt" && sed "s/00/${1:-00}/" src/d00.ts > "src/d${1:00}.ts" && sed "s/00/${1:-00}/" src/d00.test.ts > "src/d${1:00}.test.ts"; }; new
scripts.pull: pull() { curl -s "https://adventofcode.com/2024/day/${1:-0}/input" -H "Cookie: session=$(kv get aoc)" | tee "inputs/${1:-00}.txt"; }; pull
